TraitDef.label: invested
TraitDef.description: This pawn has formed a connection to the spiritual energy of the Cosmere and holds Biochromatic Equivalent Units (BEUs), representing their level of innate investiture.

li.label: invested
li.description: This pawn is invested. They are capable of holding units of investiture (BEU).

li.label: First Heightening
li.description: Perfect pitch. This pawn has a heightened sense of tone and resonance.

li.label: Second Heightening
li.description: Perfect color recognition. This pawn perceives even the most subtle shifts in color.

li.label: Third Heightening
li.description: Perfect life sense. This pawn can sense nearby living beings without visual cues.

li.label: Fourth Heightening
li.description: Agelessness. The pawn ceases to physically age and is resistant to age-related decay.

li.label: Fifth Heightening
li.description: Enhanced bioinvestiture. The pawn's spiritual connection becomes vastly more efficient.

li.label: Sixth Heightening
li.description: Innate investiture control. The pawn can manipulate spiritual energy without effort.

li.label: Seventh Heightening
li.description: Command breaking. The pawn can disrupt existing investiture patterns with ease.

li.label: Eighth Heightening
li.description: Subconscious investiture shaping. The pawn influences the spiritual realm through intent alone.

li.label: Ninth Heightening
li.description: Investiture independence. The pawn no longer requires physical conduits to utilize spiritual energy.

li.label: Tenth Heightening
li.description: This pawn holds over 50,000 BEUs. Their spiritual aura is overwhelming.
